content: when switching colors be sure to start the new color on a knit round to one repeat in mc1 create a smoother color transition two repeats in mc2 cut mc2 work rounds 1-2 in mc1 until the piece 18 *k1 p1* around cut the yarn loop it through the remaining 16 sts and secure the end return to your co edge using size us 2 needles and your cc yarn with the rs facing pick up all 112 120 128 sts from this edge removing the waste yarn afterwards work 1x1 ribbing for 2 or until the brim is the same length as the brim on the first side of the hat continue working this side of the hat as before making sure to work it to the same length before starting the crown decreases work the decreases and finishing steps as before fold one end of the hat inside the other and voila if you choose to block your hat keep both ends unfolded so that it dries more quickly dichotomy pg 3
